dublin_core.dcvalue: Integrated mobile application that provides education tools, iconic messaging kits and mobile games geared towards maternal and child health, family planning and adolescent girls' health for low literate women.
Community members, Patient, Clinics, National health system
Subhi Quraishi, CEO and Mobile 4 Development Director, ZMQ Development | Tel: +91-124-4368897, Email: subhi@zmq.in
USAID, Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI),Technology Development Board (TBD), Department of Science and Technology, Government of India
Mobile Integrated Resources For Aurat-Women (MIRA) Channel

data collection and reporting, Client education and behavior change communication, Electronic decision support, electronic health records, Child Health, Family planning, Maternal Health, Newborn Health, Sexual and Reproductive Health
